full: Say/, the photographer said as the camera flashed! / and I had gone to / to get our photos taken today. The first photo we really wanted was a picture of us dressed as / pretending to be a /. When we saw the proofs of it, I was a bit / because it looked different than in my head. (I hadn't imagined so many / behind us.) However, the second photo was exactly what I wanted. We both looked like / wearing / and /--exactly what I had in mind!
